author: wadalliance
title: Zimbabwe Developers for Cardano
description: As blockchain becomes the default tech to solve local problems, lack of competent Cardano devs will become an issue unless addressed now.
solution: Bring local Zimbabwe devs on a discovery journey of the Cardano protocol through hackathons, training and dApp design.
experience: WADA: Skilled team of Cardano Community practitioners and entrepreneurs, located in hubs across Africa and the diaspora
